replies.body:
Posigndun:
Some interesting questions that people might've seen

1) Does looking at a picture of the sun hurt your eyes?
2) Is throwing your hair in the garbage safe?
3) Is there a spell to become a mermaid that actually works?
4) How do you tell which side of a potato chip is saltier?
5) How do I get accepted to Hogwarts?
6) I was bitten by a turtle when I was young, can I still drink orange juice?

That's enough xD
